name: roq/fix/SettlType
comment: Indicates order settlement period. If present, SettlDate <64> overrides this field. If both SettlType <63> and SettlDate <64> are omitted, the default for SettlType <63> is '0' (Regular)

values.name: Regular
values.comment: Regular / FX Spot settlement (T+1 or T+2 depending on currency)

values.name: FX_SPOT_NEXT_SETTLEMENT
values.comment: FX Spot Next settlement (Spot+1, aka next day)

values.name: BrokenDate
values.comment: Broken date - for FX expressing non-standard tenor, SettlDate <64> must be specified
